participant_1.background:
I enjoyed listening to my neighbors' conversations while I was mountain biking last year.
I'm a musician who enjoys kpop and broke my nose in a fight when I was young.
i like to go to the farmers market every weekend.
i own a black suburban.
i m taking online classes.

participant_2.background:
My family is poor, but we work hard to make a living.
i m very familiar with hospitals and doctors.
I like the color green because it reminds me of fresh produce, which is a key ingredient in my cupcake business.
I got my finger crushed in a machine when I was working at the factory.
i m the middle child of 3 siblings.

content.text: Hi, I'm David, what's your name?
Hi David, my name is Hannah.
Nice to meet you, Hannah. How's your day going?
It's going pretty good. I just finished making cupcakes for my cupcake business.
That's awesome! I love cupcakes. Do you make different flavors?
Yeah, I make a variety of flavors. My most popular flavors are chocolate, vanilla, and red velvet.
Those are all great flavors. I love chocolate and vanilla.
Me too! I also make a variety of fruit flavors like strawberry, blueberry, and lemon.
Those sound delicious! I'll have to try some of your cupcakes sometime.
You're welcome to come by my cupcake shop and try some.
I will definitely do that. Thanks for the offer.
So, what else do you like to do in your free time?
I like to go to the farmers market every weekend. I also like to mountain bike.
That's cool. I've never been mountain biking before.
You should try it sometime. It's a lot of fun.
I might have to try it out.
